# Generated by "yarp cmake" & jgvictores 2015

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8.9)

# Start a project.
project(syncedCameraRecorder)

find_package(OpenCV REQUIRED)
find_package(YARP REQUIRED)

# Include any directories needed for YARP
include_directories(${YARP_INCLUDE_DIRS})

# Set up our main executable.
add_executable(syncedCameraRecorder main.cpp Camera.cpp CameraThread.cpp ImageConverter.cpp SyncedCameraRecorder.cpp Camera.hpp CameraThread.hpp ImageConverter.hpp SyncedCameraRecorder.hpp)
target_link_libraries(syncedCameraRecorder ${OpenCV_LIBS} ${YARP_LIBRARIES} )
